alt.menu: Your wallet address, settings, sign-out and external links

sign_in.title: A browser-based Ethereum wallet secured by the Internet Computer and supporting networked-custody
sign_in.description: $oisy_name provides a seamless on-chain experience to manage your Ethereum assets. Using native web technologies and advanced cryptography, $oisy_name eliminates the need for browser extensions or mobile apps.

text.icp_deposits: Note: For ICP deposits, use the 'Receive' button in your ICP account to get the right address.

hero.use_with_caution: Learn more about this alpha version. Use with caution.
hero.learn_more_about_erc20_icp: Learn more about ERC20 ICP on Ethereum.

text.title: Settings
text.principal_description: Your ID for the $oisy_name. Created by your Internet Identity.
text.session_description: All sessions last 1 hour. After 1 hour, you will need to authenticate again with Internet Identity.
text.testnets_description: Display the test networks (Sepolia) and twin tokens on testnets (ckTESTBTC and ckSepolia).
text.tokens_description: The list of tokens currently supported by your $oisy_name.

alt.testnets_toggle: Toggle to show or hide testnets

error.loading_cketh_helper: Error while loading the ckETH helper contract address. No minter canister ID has been initialized.

warning.trust_token: Make sure that you trust the token that you are adding. If the token you are adding is controlled by a malicious party, they could try and scam you e.g. by making you believe you received a significant amount of tokens in order to trick you into sending them tokens in return or perform other undesired actions. Learn more about scams and security risks e.g. here.

error.no_metadata: No metadata were fetched for the contract address.
error.unexpected: Something went wrong while saving the token.
error.loading_metadata: Error while loading the ERC20 contract metadata.
